info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.services

Interface AsyncService<TService>

  • Type Parameters:
    TService - concrete type of service for chaining CompletableFuture calls.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComputationalUnitExecutor, Scheduler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorExecutionEnvironment, ActorSystem, ActorSystemRouter, DefaultScheduler, ExecutionSystem, HttpClient, HttpEndpoint, HttpGetEndpoint, HttpsEndpoint, HttpServer, HttpsServer, MapInsertingHttpEndpoint, NettyClient, NettyServer, SingleThreadExecutor, TcpClient, TcpEndpoint, TcpServer, UdpClient, UdpEndpoint, UdpServer

    public interface AsyncService<TService>
    A service which is capable to start and stop asynchronously.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<TService> start()
      Asynchronously start the service.
      CompletableFuture<TService> stop()
      Asynchronously stop the service.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        CompletableFuture<TService> start()
        Asynchronously start the service.
        Returns:
        a future object which can be used for operation completion waiting. Future return value is just this instance.

      • stop

        CompletableFuture<TService> stop()
        Asynchronously stop the service.
        Returns:
        a future object which can be used for operation completion waiting. Future return value is just this instance.
